participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Active and outgoing, enjoys fitness and spending time with pets.
participant_1.background: i have short hair. two dogs live with me. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i go to the gym regularly.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and driven, focused on career advancement and personal growth.
participant_2.background: my parents are very wealthy bankers. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i drive a bmw. i plan to go to business school next year.
